name: Twins Tigers
description:
I congratulate you on Christmas and Happy New Year!
This application will allow you to interact with two furry tigers and their environment.

Interactive elements:

  • Snow globe: change character;
  • Hair dryer: change hair length (girl only);
  • Hanger: change outfit;
  • Kettle: Drink tea;
  • Character's right ear: pull the character's ear;
  • Character's left ear: pat the character's head;
  • Character: use a laptop (returns to the starting position by a second click)
